TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScopedMessagePartSpecification extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Specifies which parts are included in a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class contains the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification> instances of different messages, each distinguished by the message Action.

Docs.summary: Checks whether there are parts that match a given action key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the given action is not present in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>, then the message parts configured for the Wildcard action ("*") are returned.
